projects.name: Pimax: The World's First 8K VR Headset
projects.description: Pimax 8K allows users to experience VR with Peripheral vision while solving the problem of screen door effect and motion sickness.
projects.fundingPlans: Pledge $599 or more and recieve the First 8K Ever! Tip: If you already have Steam VR or HTC Vive base stations and controllers, get this reward.Supports single base station for 360-degree positional tracking

projects.name: Folklore: The Affliction (2nd Printing)
projects.description: A cooperative/solo adventure board game of mystery, fear, and dark fantasy.
projects.fundingPlans: Pledge $30 or more and recieve Folklore The Affliction: Adventure Creation Kit, Folklore The Affliction: Nightmare Adventures, and an EXCLUSIVE Metal Leader Token!

projects.name: War Room: A Larry Harris Game
projects.description: Larry Harris, renowned Axis & Allies designer, and Nightingale Games present WAR ROOM, a deluxe global World War II board game for 2-6.
projects.fundingPlans: Pledge $149 or more and recieve War Room: A Larry Harros Game, all of the stretch goals, and free shipping!
